Description: Click here to contact us directly THE GEARLICIOUS COLLECTION Proudly Presents... Call us & well make a deal! (502) 414-GEAR (4327) or shoot us an email.We provide a 48 hour, no-questions-asked return policy. PEERLESS MONARCH HOLLOW BODY ARCHTOP ELECTRIC GUITAR Butter anyone? Perfect action, great tone, the flagship of the Peerless line. A hidden gem in the archtop world. This one is stunning to look at and sounds spectacular. Only thing to note some cracks near the tone knob. Does not affect sound. As always, all of our used equipment is sold as-is. Dont wait on this great deal. Ships FAST! Features: Boring Fine Print SHIPPING If you are trying to get a shipping price and the ebay shipping calculator does not work for you, then the following rates generally apply in most cases: Guitars and Basses: $165 Worldwide Keyboards and synths: $165 Worldwide (*Note, some keyboards/synths are heavy and exceed USPS limits for some international customers.) Amps: Please contact us for individual quotes. We always declare the full purchase price on the customs form. Please dont email us about declaring lower amounts for customs. PAYMENT If you plan to use Paypal, we have to ship to your paypal shipping address. Please contact us about other payment methods. We report non-paying bidders. Do not bid if you might not have the funds. We do not accept trades. RETURNS & REFUNDS Our Guarantee: We are musicians and we want to make sure you love what you get. To that end, if FOR ANY REASON you are not satisfied with what you get, well take it back*. If its CLEAR that we screwed up (didnt photo or describe something**) well refund everything. If its NOT clear that we missed something important OR you just dont like it, well refund you everything minus 10% restocking fee and return shipping. * within 7 days of receipt ** something means something that is significant to the equipments primary functionality or major cosmetic issue. ABOUT US We love gear. Were musicians and love that each piece has a story behind it. We treat these like works of art. We love our customers. Seriously, we love learning more about you and your creative ventures. Let us know more about yourself! We ship FAST! And by fast, we mean sometimes the same day the auction closes, most commonly within the next one or two business days. We buy stuff too, and we know what its like to want to get your hands on your new gear!
Title: PEERLESS MONARCH HOLLOW BODY ARCHTOP ELECTRIC GUITAR grlc1950
